discovered_solutions.title: A WARNING
discovered_solutions.formatted: A WARNING BELIEVE NOTHING FROM THIS BOOK EXCEPT WHAT YOU KNOW TO BE TRUE TEST THE KNOWLEDGE FIND YOUR TRUTH EXPERIENCE YOUR DEATH DO NOT EDIT OR CHANGE THIS BOOK OR THE MESSAGE CONTAINED WITHIN EITHER THE WORDS OR THEIR NUMBERS FOR ALL IS SACRED
discovered_solutions.notes: Meta-instruction about how to read Liber Primus

discovered_solutions.title: SOME WISDOM
discovered_solutions.formatted: SOME WISDOM THE PRIMES ARE SACRED THE TOTIENT FUNCTION IS SACRED ALL THINGS SHOULD BE ENCRYPTED KNOW THIS SHADOWS ARE THE REAL BUFFER SUOID CARNAL OBSCURA FORM MOBIUS ANALOGUOID MOURNFUL AETHEREAL CABAL
discovered_solutions.notes: Confirms totient function is important. Contains mysterious terms: SUOID, MOBIUS ANALOGUOID, AETHEREAL CABAL

discovered_solutions.title: A KOAN
discovered_solutions.formatted: A KOAN A MAN DECIDED TO GO AND STUDY WITH A MASTER HE WENT TO THE DOOR OF THE MASTER WHO ARE YOU WHO WISHES TO STUDY HERE ASKED THE MASTER THE STUDENT TOLD THE MASTER HIS NAME THAT IS NOT WHAT YOU ARE THAT IS ONLY WHAT YOU ARE CALLED WHO ARE YOU WHO WISHES TO STUDY HERE HE ASKED AGAIN THE MAN THOUGHT FOR A MOMENT AND REPLIED I AM A PROFESSOR THAT IS WHAT YOU DO NOT WHAT YOU ARE
discovered_solutions.notes: Zen koan about identity. Highest score in batch (3303.9). Classic Cicada philosophy.

discovered_solutions.title: THE LOSS OF DIVINITY
discovered_solutions.formatted: THE LOSS OF DIVINITY THE CIRCUMFERENCE PRACTICES THREE BEHAVIORS WHICH CAUSE THE LOSS OF DIVINITY CONSUMPTION WE CONSUME TOO MUCH BECAUSE WE BELIEVE THE FOLLOWING TWO ERRORS WITHIN THE DECEPTION WE DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH OR THERE IS NOT ENOUGH WE HAVE WHAT WE HAVE NOW BY LUCK AND WE WILL NOT BE STRONG ENOUGH LATER TO OBTAIN WHAT WE NEED MOST THINGS ARE NOT WORTH CONSUMING
discovered_solutions.notes: Anti-materialist philosophy. References 'The Circumference'. Second highest score (2627.9).

CAESAR_0: Uses direct Gematria Primus mapping - NO ENCRYPTION

key_insights: Two pages (63, 68) used CAESAR_0 - essentially PLAINTEXT in Gematria Primus
All 4 readable pages used simple CAESAR shifts - not complex polyalphabetic ciphers
Page 63 CONFIRMS 'THE TOTIENT FUNCTION IS SACRED' - validates Ï†(p) approach
Page 59 contains meta-instructions about reading Liber Primus
The simple ciphers may have been intentionally easy 'gateway' pages
